tourBios.carHigh: Has competed on eGolf Tour, NGA Tour, West Florida Professional Tour and Fore the Players.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won West Virginia state high school championship and West Virginia Junior Championship...Was 2007 Conference USA Freshman of the Year at Marshall University...Set the Marshall scoring record in 2011 and won the NCAA individual title as an invitee in 2011...Named Marshall Male Athlete of the Year in 2011.
tourBios.personal: Has one sister...Attended Capital High School in Charleston, W.Va...Earliest golf memory was chipping in for par on the first hole he ever played at age 13...If not a professional golfer he would like to be an ESPN SportsCenter anchor...Biggest thrill in golf was finishing with three birdies to qualify at the second stage for the finals of the 2013 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament...Favorite courses played are The Old White TPC at the Greenbrier and Chambers Bay...Would like to play Augusta National and Pebble Beach...Favorite teams are Marshall, West Virginia University and the Pittsburgh Steelers...Personal website is christianmbrand.com...Always marks ball on the green with a West Virginia quarter...Favorite TV show is "Modern Family" and movie is "Remember The Titans."...Favorite entertainer is Jason Aldean...Favorite athlete is LeBron James, who he'd like to trade places with for a day...Favorite city/vacation spots are San Diego and Atlantis in the Bahamas...Would round out his dream foursome with his dad, Jack Nicklaus and Bobby Jones...Loves dogs...Favorite quote is "Hard work triumphs all."...If a song is played to introduce a player at the first tee his would be "Country Roads."...Twitter name is @seebrand.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T30th in 2015 at the Rex Hospital Open.
